product_name: Adventure Paddleboarding All Rounder Stand Up Paddleboard - 7'
long_description: Lightweight and easy for young paddlers to maneuver, this entry-level board provides a stable platform for kids up to 110 lbs. to practice their paddling technique on flatwater and small surf.
short_description: Lightweight and easy for young paddlers to maneuver, this entry-level board provides a stable platform for kids up to 110 lbs. to practice their paddling technique on flatwater and small surf.
